Services Pricing Team
At-home express

Easy COVID-19 Test

FDA-approved RT-qPCR test is validated to detect active SARS-CoV-2 virus in individuals experiencing symptoms of COVID-19. After a brief online medical screen, your collection kit will be sent to your home. Samples are sent to and processed at our partner's laboratory in Secaucus, NJ. Results emailed to you within 24 hours from the time we receive your sample.
